text:
It will be based on Windows 11
22H2, Server vNext had a lot of new functionalities announced recently that
probably won't be in the next W11 LTSC, better test on W11 22H2.

metadata.subject: RE: [patchmanagement] ESU announcement coming?
metadata.email_text_original:
[Vous ne recevez pas souvent de courriers de florian.stosse@safrangroup.com.
Découvrez pourquoi ceci est important à
https://aka.ms/LearnAboutSenderIdentification ] It will be based on Windows 11
22H2, Server vNext had a lot of new functionalities announced recently that
probably won't be in the next W11 LTSC, better test on W11 22H2.
________________________________________ De : patchmanagement@googlegroups.com
de la part de sysadminbeard Envoyé : mercredi 6 décembre 2023 05:00:49 À :
PatchManagement Objet : Re: [patchmanagement] ESU announcement coming? CAUTION:
This message originated from an outside organization. In case of suspicion,
click on "Report to SAFRAN Security" from the Outlook ribbon.
________________________________ 24H2 -
https://can01.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Ftechcommunity.microsoft.com%2Ft5%2Fwindows-it-pro-blog%2Fwindows-client-roadmap-update-april-2023%2Fba-p%2F3805227&data=05%7C02%7Cemail_ingestion%40bighatgroup.com%7C9f43df0e308443dea3f008dbfa8060ad%7C5a01497e1bcb4711b6e6d24f4ab00393%7C0%7C0%7C638379201690067112%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C2000%7C%7C%7C&sdata=QlHIZ7aqp%2FDad9PrK4Y%2BH95%2F852hnSxj2g85XjxGBOk%3D&reserved=0
Essentially, if you want an idea of what the look and feel will be, take a look
at Server vNext (minus the server features obvs...)  I want to know when the next
LTSC is coming really. It can be Windows 11 based. -- James Pulver CLASSE
Computer Group Cornell University ________________________________________ From:
'Susan Bradley' via PatchManagement Sent: Tuesday, December 5, 2023 1:48 PM To:
patchma...@googlegroups.com Subject: Re: [patchmanagement] ESU announcement
coming?
https://can01.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Ftechcommunity.microsoft.com%2Ft5%2Fwindows-it-pro-blog%2Fplan-for-windows-10-eos-with-windows-11-windows-365-and-esu%2Fba-p%2F4000414&data=05%7C02%7Cemail_ingestion%40bighatgroup.com%7C9f43df0e308443dea3f008dbfa8060ad%7C5a01497e1bcb4711b6e6d24f4ab00393%7C0%7C0%7C638379201690067112%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C2000%7C%7C%7C&sdata=zMPL5SsG%2FFVukUtviAshmgisiw6ux6LkS8DXKsL9BK0%3D&reserved=0>
